p: Titer reduction assay was performed as previously described [ 11]. In brief, MDCK cells grown in 24-well plates were inoculated with the influenza PR8 virus at an MOI of 0.01. After 2-hour incubation at 37°C, inoculations were replaced by fresh Opti-MEM (1.5 µg/mL of TPCK-trypsin) containing test extracts at 20 µg/mL concentration. At 36-hour after infection (p.i.), the supernatants were removed for titration.
